name: Rake
description: Thieves who have refined their skills to become elite infiltrators and manipulators, combining stealth with social cunning and specialized techniques to accomplish seemingly impossible heists and operations.

resource_systems.name: Energy
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers stealth abilities and precision strikes
resource_systems.regeneration: 4 per 6 seconds, +7 when in stealth or during social manipulation
mechanics: Energy points are spent to perform special stealth maneuvers and precision attacks
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming energy over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum energy
Depleted energy causes penalties to stealth and attack speed
Can be temporarily boosted through adrenaline in critical situations
Successful stealth kills or social manipulations restore a portion of energy

resource_systems.name: Cunning
resource_systems.description: Mental acuity and tactical awareness that enhances deception and exploitation of weaknesses
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully using stealth, social manipulation, or exploiting weaknesses
mechanics: Increases by 15 when successfully picking locks, disarming traps, or manipulating targets
Increases by 20 when landing critical strikes from stealth or executing perfect heists
Decreases by 15 when detected during stealth or when social deceptions fail
Decreases by 20 when failing to pick locks or disarm traps
Can be spent to enhance stealth abilities or execute precision strikes
Higher Cunning increases critical hit chance, damage, and social manipulation success

resource_systems.name: Infamy
resource_systems.description: Reputation and notoriety that can be leveraged for intimidation or respect
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully completing difficult heists or manipulations
mechanics: Increases by 10 when completing challenging heists or infiltrations
Increases by 5 when successfully manipulating high-value targets
Decreases by 10 when failing publicly or being captured
Decreases by 5 when reputation is questioned or undermined
Can be spent to intimidate enemies or impress potential allies
Higher Infamy increases the effectiveness of social abilities and reputation-based skills

class_mechanics.name: Advanced Shadow Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Superior ability to move unseen and manipulate shadows
effects: Can move silently at full speed across any surface
Able to hide in plain sight with virtually no cover
Significantly reduced visibility to detection abilities and magical senses
Can manipulate shadows to create distractions or temporary concealment
Presence can dim lights in a wider area, creating advantageous conditions

class_mechanics.name: Social Engineering
class_mechanics.description: Expert manipulation of social dynamics and individual psychology
effects: Can quickly assess personalities and motivations of targets
Able to craft convincing personas and backstories on the fly
Can manipulate social situations to create opportunities or distractions
Gains significant advantages in negotiations and interrogations
Can plant suggestions that targets believe are their own ideas

class_mechanics.name: Advanced Precision
class_mechanics.description: Masterful knowledge of vulnerabilities and precision techniques
effects: Greatly increased critical hit chance and damage
Can target specific vulnerabilities for debilitating effects
Able to disable rather than kill with perfect precision
Can analyze and exploit structural weaknesses in objects and environments
Attacks can bypass a portion of armor and magical protections

class_mechanics.name: Heist Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Comprehensive expertise in planning and executing complex operations
effects: Can quickly case locations to identify security measures and valuables
Able to formulate effective infiltration plans with minimal information
Can improvise solutions to unexpected complications during operations
Gains advantages when coordinating with allies during heists
Can identify the most valuable targets and optimal extraction routes

skill_trees.name: Master Infiltrator
key_abilities: Ghost: Move without leaving any trace of your presence
Security Specialist: Bypass even magical and planar security systems
Perfect Timing: Identify and exploit patterns in guard rotations and security systems

skill_trees.name: Social Manipulator
key_abilities: Perfect Disguise: Completely assume another's identity, including mannerisms
Silver Tongue: Convince others to believe even implausible deceptions
Psychological Manipulation: Identify and exploit emotional vulnerabilities

skill_trees.name: Shadow Operative
key_abilities: Shadow Strike: Attack from stealth with devastating precision
Vanish: Disappear from sight even when being directly observed
Exploit Vulnerability: Identify and target critical weaknesses for maximum effect

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 5 points in any thief skill tree
challenges: Successfully complete a complex heist without being detected
Master advanced lockpicking and trap disarming

hero_classes.name: Arcane Trickster
hero_classes.description: Rakes who have incorporated arcane magic into their repertoire, using illusions and enchantments to further their goals while maintaining a code of honor.

hero_classes.name: Shadowblade
hero_classes.description: Rakes who have mastered the manipulation of shadows and stealth, becoming one with the darkness to strike with lethal precision.

hero_classes.name: BlackGuard
hero_classes.description: Rakes who have embraced darker powers and ruthless methods, combining stealth with intimidation and cruelty to achieve their goals.

legendary_items.name: Skeleton Keys
effects: Can open any non-magical lock with a single attempt
Provides significant bonuses when attempting to bypass magical locks
Can be used to temporarily disable magical wards and barriers

legendary_items.name: Cloak of Shadows
effects: Enhances stealth abilities, making the wearer nearly invisible in shadows
Can manipulate nearby shadows to create distractions or concealment
Provides resistance to detection magic and scrying attempts

lore: Rakes represent thieves who have elevated their craft from simple burglary to an art form, combining exceptional stealth abilities with social manipulation and precise planning. Where ordinary thieves might rely on opportunity and basic skills, Rakes approach their operations with meticulous preparation, psychological insight, and a comprehensive understanding of security systems both mundane and magical. The path to becoming a Rake often involves apprenticeship under a master or membership in an elite thieves' guild, though some exceptional individuals develop their skills independently through years of increasingly ambitious operations. Those who succeed find themselves capable of accomplishing heists and infiltrations that others would consider impossible, earning both notoriety among authorities and respect among their peers. Rakes serve various roles in society, from independent operators who select their own targets to guild specialists who handle the most challenging aspects of group operations. Some focus on acquiring specific high-value items for collectors or recovering lost artifacts, while others specialize in gathering intelligence or manipulating social situations to create opportunities for themselves or their allies. Their combination of stealth, social skills, and tactical thinking makes them versatile operatives who can adapt to unexpected complications during missions. Though they may lack the raw combat power of warriors or the magical versatility of spellcasters, the ability of Rakes to bypass obstacles, gather critical information, and strike from unexpected angles makes them invaluable in complex operations where brute force would fail.
